original_text: And it came to pass, as the ark of the covenant of the Lord came to the city of David, that Michal, the daughter of Saul looking out at a window saw king David dancing and playing: and she despised him in her heart.
korean_text: 여호와의 언약궤가 다윗 성으로 들어올 때에 사울의 딸 미갈이 창으로 내다보다가 다윗 왕이 춤추며 뛰노는 것을 보고 그 마음에 업신여겼더라

sentences.original_text: as the ark of the covenant of the Lord
came to the city of David,
that Michal, the daughter of Saul
saw king David dancing and playing:
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕이 춤추고 연주하는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: and she despised him in her heart.
